attributes.action: legislate that all external public clocks should maintain an accurate time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Public clocks are a feature of churches, stations, shops fronts etc. If one shows an inaccurate time it can mislead passers by. We petition for accuracy of time, or a 12 o'clock setting denoting redundancy, to be a legal requirement.
